author: Richard Dyson
title: Scrap generous tax breaks for final salary pensions
text: Scrap generous tax breaks for final salary pensions The Budget should address this one tax unfairness, if nothing else George Osborne's previous budgets have surprised with the breadth of their reform, on Wednesday he may surprise again Photo: PA
